verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֑וֹת <WH4609> of degrees מִמַּעֲמַקִּ֖ים <WH4615> Out of the depths קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <WH7121> have I cried יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto thee O LORD

אֲדֹנָי֮ <WH136> Lord שִׁמְעָ֪ה <WH8085> hear בְק֫וֹלִ֥י <WH6963> my voice תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <WH1961> Let אָ֭זְנֶיךָ <WH241> let thine ears קַשֻּׁב֑וֹת <WH7183> be attentive לְ֝ק֗וֹל <WH6963> to the voice תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> of my supplications
אִם־ <WH518> If עֲוֹנ֥וֹת <WH5771> iniquities תִּשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> shouldest mark יָ֑הּ <WH3050> If thou LORD אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> O Lord מִ֣י <WH4310> who יַעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> who shall stand
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עִמְּךָ֥ <WH5973> there הַסְּלִיחָ֑ה <WH5547> But [there is] forgiveness לְ֝מַ֗עַן <WH4616> that תִּוָּרֵֽא׃ <WH3372> with thee that thou mayest be feared
קִוִּ֣יתִי <WH6960> I wait יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> for the LORD קִוְּתָ֣ה <WH6960> doth wait נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul וְֽלִדְבָר֥וֹ <WH1697> and in his word הוֹחָֽלְתִּי׃ <WH3176> do I hope

נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> My soul לַֽאדֹנָ֑י <WH136> [waiteth] for the Lord מִשֹּׁמְרִ֥ים <WH8104> more than they that watch לַ֝בֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> for the morning שֹׁמְרִ֥ים <WH8104> [I say more than] they that watch לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> for the morning

יַחֵ֥ל <WH3176> hope יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Let Israel אֶל־ <WH413> in יְה֫וָה <WH3068> in the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עִם־ <WH5973> with יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for with the LORD הַחֶ֑סֶד <WH2617> [there is] mercy וְהַרְבֵּ֖ה <WH7235> and with him [is] plenteous עִמּ֣וֹ <WH5973> with פְדֽוּת׃ <WH6304> redemption
וְ֭הוּא <WH1931> and He יִפְדֶּ֣ה <WH6299> And he shall redeem אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel מִ֝כֹּ֗ל <WH3605> all עֲוֹנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH5771> from all his iniquities
